en.title: Jury Award
en.info: Won Special Jury Prize at Innothon'24

en.title: Built my first **cybersecurity project**
en.text: Developed 'Cryptology Communication' using Python, AES encryption, and steganography.

en.title: Moved to **Vijayawada for college**
en.text: Started B.Tech in CSE (Cybersecurity) at KL University in July 2023.

en.title: Completed **Google Cybersecurity Certificate**
en.text: Earned the Google Cybersecurity Professional Certificate from Coursera in July 2023.

en.title: Joined KL **Cybersecurity Club**
en.text: Started contributing as an active member in university’s Cybersecurity & Ethical Hacking Club.

en.title: Became **Mentor** at KL Cyber Club
en.text: Took up mentoring responsibilities and began designing technical sessions for peers.

en.title: Certified **Python Software Programmer**
en.text: Completed NSDC PMKVY 4.0 Software Programmer (Python) certification under NCVET, Govt. of India.

en.title: Won **Special Jury Award** at **Innothon '24**
en.text: Our team KLCyberSAC won the Special Jury Award for an OSINT automation tool at KCG's national-level hackathon.

en.title: Participated in **CTFs & Hackathons**
en.text: Took part in multiple CTFs and security competitions on platforms like CTFtime and picoCTF.

en.title: Appointed **Head of Training & Development**
en.text: Led 15+ workshops and mentorship programs in KL Cyber Club for hands-on security training.

en.title: Started Personal Project: **Secure Web LMS**
en.text: Began development on a secure Learning Management System using React, Node.js, and JWT.

en.title: Earned **Juniper JNCIA-Junos** Certification
en.text: Achieved Juniper Networks Certified Associate, valid through Jan 2028.

en.title: Ranked **Top 1% on TryHackMe**
en.text: Completed 150+ labs with a 260+ day streak on TryHackMe’s global cybersecurity platform.

en.title: Started **Capstone Project**
en.text: Began developing a Zero Trust API Security model integrating AI and cloud analytics.

en.title: Launched **Portfolio Website**
en.text: Released my personal developer website showcasing cybersecurity & web projects.
